cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("inference")

	INFERENCE("", "id").INPUT_OUTPUT(map[string]string{
		"in1": "out1",
		"in2": "out2",
	}).INFERENCE_CONFIG(map[string]any{
		"classification": map[string]any{
			"num_top_classes":           2,
			"results_field":             "prediction",
			"top_classes_results_field": "probabilities",
		},
	})
	INFERENCE("dst", "id").FIELD_MAP(map[string]string{
		"in1": "out1",
		"in2": "out2",
	}).INFERENCE_CONFIG(map[string]any{
		"classification": map[string]any{
			"num_top_classes":           2,
			"results_field":             "prediction",
			"top_classes_results_field": "probabilities",
		},
	})

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: inference
processors:
  - inference:
      tag: inference_id
      model_id: id
      input_output:
        - input_field: in1
          output_field: out1
        - input_field: in2
          output_field: out2
      inference_config: {
          "classification": {
            "num_top_classes": 2,
            "results_field": "prediction",
            "top_classes_results_field": "probabilities"
          }
        }
  - inference:
      tag: inference_id_into_dst
      model_id: id
      target_field: dst
      field_map:
        in1: out1
        in2: out2
      inference_config: {
          "classification": {
            "num_top_classes": 2,
            "results_field": "prediction",
            "top_classes_results_field": "probabilities"
          }
        }
